descriptions.en: When its wings catch the wind, the bones within produce electricity. This Pokémon dives into the ocean, catching prey by electrocuting them.
descriptions.es: When its wings catch the wind, the bones within produce electricity. This Pokémon dives into the ocean, catching prey by electrocuting them.
descriptions.ca: Quan les seves ales agafen el vent, els ossos de dins produeixen electricitat. Aquest Pokémon es llança a l'oceà, caçant la seva presa electrocutant-la.
